description:
A one-stop development tool built on the Visual Studio Code framework. Easy-to-use features include project management, programming, real-time preview, inspection, debugging, and cloud testing.

Built based on the VS Code framework, Huawei Quick App IDE is a one-stop quick app development tool that provides you with services such as project management, programming, real-time preview, inspection, debugging, cloud testing and release. In addition to providing the must-have capabilities such as quick app fast programming and full coverage of device models in cloud testing, it also inherits your habit to maximize your development productivity.
